00016 #include "TTIncoming.h"
00017 
00018 #include <TTEScheduler.h>
00019 #include <SchedulerMessageEvents_m.h>
00020 
00021 namespace TTEthernetModel {
00022 
00023 Define_Module( TTIncoming);
00024 
00025 TTIncoming::TTIncoming()
00026 {
00027     frame = NULL;
00028 }
00029 
00030 TTIncoming::~TTIncoming()
00031 {
00032     if (frame != NULL)
00033     {
00034         delete frame;
00035     }
00036 }
00037 
00038 void TTIncoming::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00039 {
00040     //Incoming Message
00041     if (msg->arrivedOn("in"))
00042     {
00043         TTEScheduler *tteScheduler = (TTEScheduler*) getParentModule()->getSubmodule("tteScheduler");
00044         //get current time in cylce
00045         unsigned int currentTicks = tteScheduler->getTicks();
00046         //Now check for correct arrival:
00047         if (frame != NULL)
00048         {
00049             ev.printf("Received frame before permanence point of previous frame \n");
00050             emit(ctDroppedSignal, 1);
00051             delete msg;
00052         }
00053         //Check too early
00054         else if (currentTicks < (unsigned int) par("receive_window_start").longValue())
00055         {
00056             ev.printf(
00057                     "Received frame in %s too early! Receive Time was %d Ticks, should have been between %d and %d! \n",
00058                     getName(), currentTicks, par("receive_window_start").longValue(),
00059                     par("receive_window_end").longValue());
00060             bubble("Frame to early");
00061             emit(ctDroppedSignal, 1);
00062             delete msg;
00063         }
00064         //Check too late
00065         else if (currentTicks > (unsigned int) par("receive_window_end").longValue())
00066         {
00067             ev.printf(
00068                     "Received frame in %s too late! Receive Time was %d Ticks, should have been between %d and %d! \n",
00069                     getName(), currentTicks, par("receive_window_start").longValue(),
00070                     par("receive_window_end").longValue());
00071             bubble("Frame to late");
00072             emit(ctDroppedSignal, 1);
00073             delete msg;
00074         }
00075         //Timing ok
00076         else
00077         {
00078             //delay for permanence_pit
00079             getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2", 0, "status/hourglass");
00080             frame = (EtherFrame *) msg;
00081             SchedulerActionTimeEvent *event = new SchedulerActionTimeEvent("PIT Event", ACTION_TIME_EVENT);
00082             event->setAction_time(par("permanence_pit").doubleValue());
00083             event->setDestinationGate(gate("schedulerIn"));
00084             tteScheduler->registerEvent(event);
00085         }
00086     }
00087     else if (msg->arrivedOn("schedulerIn") && msg->getKind() == ACTION_TIME_EVENT)
00088     {
00089         delete msg;
00090         getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2", 0, "");
00091         send(frame, "out");
00092         frame = NULL;
00093     }
00094 
00095 }
00096 
00097 } //namespace
